title: Psycho-Pass: Sinners of the System Case.1 - Tsumi to Batsu
synopsis: A runaway vehicle driven by Izumi Yasaka, en route to the Public Safety Bureau building, is reported shortly before it crashes into the building. Izumi is a counselor who recently ran away while working at a latent criminal isolation and rehabilitation facility known as Sanctuary.
